comment: Lemma for ~ zringlpir . A nonzero ideal of integers contains the least positive element. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 3-Jan-2015.) (Revised by AV, 9-Jun-2019.) (Revised by AV, 27-Sep-2020.)
